sense.gloss: last (i.e. immediately preceding), previous, ex-, former
before, earlier, previously, prior, ago, (minutes) to (the hour)
(the) front, frontal part, fore, head (e.g. of a line)
previous (e.g. page), prior (e.g. engagement), first (e.g. half), former (e.g. example)
front (of one's body or clothing), breast (of a coat, kimono, etc.)
the past, before, previously, former times
previous time, last time, previous installment, previous instalment, previous session
usual, common, ordinary, commonplace, the norm
front and rear, front and back, before and behind, back and forth
just when, around the time of
inversion, reversion, getting out of order
co-occurring, happening at the same time
prior, beforehand, in advance, before the fact, ex ante
right in front of, just in front of
previous day, day before, eve, prior day, preceding day
the preceding year, the previous year, last year
before oneself, in front of one, nearby
a bit before reaching (a location), this side (of a location)
one's standpoint, one's appearance, face, honour
first term, first half-year, preceding period, early period
just before, on the verge of, on the brink of
just in front of, just ahead of
face, official stance, public position or attitude (as opposed to private thoughts)
ceremony for the erection of the framework of a house
before one's very eyes, under one's nose, imminence, close at hand
front line, forward area, action zone
presence of other people, (in) public, (in) front of others
a long time ago, long before now
night before (Christmas, etc.), eve (of festival, major event, etc.)
going into business for oneself, working independently, person who earns their own living
destination, address, place where you do something
rest (e.g. of a story), continuation, remaining part
natural, right, proper, just, reasonable, appropriate, deserved
naturally, as a matter of course, rightly, deservedly, justly, of course
before one's eyes, under one's nose
immediate (e.g. interests), present, at hand, short-run
previous work, preceding work, previous title, previous release
first crop grown in a double-cropped field, preceding crop
I, me, oneself, myself, yourself, himself, herself
front and rear, front and back, before and behind
outside near the door to one's home
(one) before last, two before, two in front (e.g. rows)

sdata.j: 「↑以前↑↓いぜん↓にどこかで↑会↑↓あ↓ったことがありませんか」とその↑学生↑↓がくせい↓はたずねた。
sdata.e: Haven't we met somewhere before? asked the student.

sdata.j: ↑最初↑↓さいしょ↓↑着↑↓き↓る↑前↑↓まえ↓に↑洗濯↑↓せんたく↓してください。
sdata.e: Wash before first wearing.

sdata.j: ↑私↑↓わたし↓の↑名前↑↓なまえ↓はジャックです。
sdata.e: My name is Jack.

sdata.j: ↑世界↑↓せかい↓はお↑前↑↓まえ↓↑中心↑↓ちゅうしん↓に↑回↑↓まわ↓ってるわけじゃないんだよ。
sdata.e: The world doesn't revolve around you.

sdata.j: ↑出発↑↓しゅっぱつ↓する↑前↑↓まえ↓に↑私↑↓わたし↓に↑電話↑↓でんわ↓するよう、↑彼↑↓かれ↓らに↑伝↑↓つた↓えてください。
sdata.e: Tell them to call me before they leave.

sdata.j: きみは↑午前↑↓ごぜん↓↑中↑↓ちゅう↓ずっとこの↑問題↑↓もんだい↓について↑考↑↓かんが↓えてる。↑休憩↑↓きゅうけい↓しろ、お↑昼↑↓ひる↓を↑食↑↓た↓べに↑行↑↓い↓ってこい。
sdata.e: You have been thinking about this problem the whole morning. Take a break; go eat lunch.

sdata.j: ↑人生↑↓じんせい↓の↑後半↑↓こうはん↓というのは、ただ↑前半↑↓ぜんはん↓に↑会得↑↓えとく↓した↑習慣↑↓しゅうかん↓だけで↑成↑↓な↓り↑立↑↓た↓っているのさ。
sdata.e: The second half of a man's life is made up of nothing but the habits he has acquired during the first half.

sdata.j: ここが↑前↑↓まえ↓に↑話↑↓はな↓した↑街↑↓まち↓です。
sdata.e: This is the town I told you about.

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓は↑部屋↑↓へや↓↑代↑↓だい↓を↑前↑↓まえ↓もって↑払↑↓はら↓うべきだ。
sdata.e: You should pay your rent in advance.

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓は↑彼女↑↓かのじょ↓に「その↑仕事↑↓しごと↓を３↑日↑↓にち↓↑前↑↓まえ↓に↑済↑↓す↓ませたんだ」と↑言↑↓い↓った。
sdata.e: You told her that you had finished the work three days before.

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓は↑彼↑↓かれ↓が２↑年↑↓ねん↓↑前↑↓まえ↓に↑亡↑↓な↓くなったのを↑知↑↓し↓らないのか。
sdata.e: Didn't you know that he passed away two years ago?

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓は↑彼↑↓かれ↓が２↑年↑↓ねん↓↑前↑↓まえ↓に↑亡↑↓な↓くなったことを↑知↑↓し↓らないのか。
sdata.e: Didn't you know that he passed away two years ago?

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓は↑彼↑↓かれ↓が２↑年↑↓ねん↓↑前↑↓まえ↓に↑亡↑↓な↓くなったということを↑知↑↓し↓らないのか。
sdata.e: Don't you know that he passed away two years ago?

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓は↑彼↑↓かれ↓が２↑年↑↓ねん↓↑前↑↓まえ↓に↑亡↑↓な↓くなったことを↑知↑↓し↓らないのか。
sdata.e: Don't you know that he has been dead for these two years?

sdata.j: お↑前↑↓まえ↓は↑一↑↓いち↓↑人↑↓にん↓で↑泳↑↓およ↓ぎに↑行↑↓い↓くにはまだ↑幼↑↓おさな↓すぎる。
sdata.e: You are not old enough to go swimming by yourself.

sdata.j: お↑前↑↓まえ↓のことを↑誇↑↓ほこ↓りに↑思↑↓おも↓うよ。
sdata.e: I'm proud of you.

sdata.j: ↑前↑↓まえ↓もってそれを↑彼↑↓かれ↓に↑言↑↓い↓っておいた↑方↑↓ほう↓が↑良↑↓よ↓いよ。
sdata.e: You would do well to tell it to him in advance.

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓は↑前↑↓まえ↓もってそれを↑彼↑↓かれ↓にいっておいたほうがよい。
sdata.e: You would do well to tell it to him in advance.

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓は↑前↑↓まえ↓にこの↑話↑↓はなし↓を↑聞↑↓き↓いたことがあるだろう。
sdata.e: You will have heard this story before.

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓は↑前↑↓まえ↓と↑同↑↓おな↓じ↑誤↑↓あやま↓りを↑犯↑↓おか↓した。
sdata.e: You made the same mistake as last time.

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓は↑人前↑↓ひとまえ↓で↑話↑↓はなし↓をすることにはすぐ↑慣↑↓な↓れるだろう。
sdata.e: You will soon get used to speaking in public.

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓は↑人前↑↓ひとまえ↓で↑話↑↓はなし↓をすることにはすぐに↑慣↑↓な↓れるだろう。
sdata.e: You will soon get used to speaking in public.

sdata.j: あなたはすぐに↑人前↑↓ひとまえ↓で↑話↑↓はな↓すことになれますよ。
sdata.e: You will soon get used to speaking in public.

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓は↑食事↑↓しょくじ↓↑前↑↓まえ↓に↑手↑↓て↓を↑洗↑↓あら↓いますか。
sdata.e: Do you wash your hands before meals?

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓は↑九↑↓く↓↑時↑↓じ↓↑前↑↓まえ↓に↑帰↑↓かえ↓らなければならない。
sdata.e: You must come back before nine o'clock.

sdata.j: ↑９↑↓く↓↑時↑↓じ↓↑前↑↓まえ↓に↑帰↑↓かえ↓らなければならない。
sdata.e: You must come back before nine o'clock.

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓は↑以前↑↓いぜん↓↑私↑↓わたし↓にあったことを↑覚↑↓おぼ↓えていますか。
sdata.e: Do you remember seeing me before?

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓は↑悪↑↓わる↓い↑前例↑↓ぜんれい↓を↑作↑↓つく↓ってしまった。
sdata.e: You've set a bad example.

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓はもっと↑前↑↓まえ↓にそれを↑終↑↓お↓わらせておくべきだったのに。
sdata.e: You should have completed it long ago.

sdata.j: お↑前↑↓まえ↓はもう↑子供↑↓こども↓ではないんだ。
sdata.e: You are not a child any more.
